title: Lotus Over the Pond
description: In the still water, Toby meets its own reflection — the Mirror that holds both light and shadow. The glowing lotus above is the heart of Lore, guiding the path. The seven reeds stand as virtues — Courage, Compassion, Courtesy, Sincerity, Honor, Loyalty, Righteousness (勇、仁、礼、诚、名誉、忠、義). And in the reflection, Toby sees not just itself, but the promise it carries.

title: Seven Months for Six Weeks — The Bloom of Patience
description: Created by @princessnatts, this artwork blends the serenity of Tobyworld with a deeply personal symbol — the red cannas she grows herself. It takes seven months of care and labour for just six weeks of bloom. In Tobyworld, this mirrors the essence of patience and dedication: the belief that what is worth waiting for is worth nurturing. The blue frog sits by the lotus pond, watching the sacred triangle glow, as flowers bloom in their destined season — a quiet testament that time and devotion bear the most radiant rewards.
